32a1('bum): can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la
32a2('bum): sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang
32a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems
32a4('bum): can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang tshad med pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis
32a5('bum): kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rnam par
32a6('bum): thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o//
32a7('bum): sems can thams cad kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas
32b1('bum): par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par/
32b2('bum): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la
32b3('bum): sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
32b4('bum): stogs bcu la gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems
32b5('bum): can thams cad kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la
32b6('bum): sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag gis kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
32b7('bum): gnas par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa
33a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
33a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs
33a3('bum): su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
33a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
33a5('bum): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su ma bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
33a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
33a7('bum): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
33b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
33b2('bum): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
33b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su
33b4('bum): gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems
33b5('bum): bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ga
33b6('bum): cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
33b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub
34a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa til phra
34a2('bum): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
34a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
34a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa
34a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
34a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
34a7('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi skyed na/ so so skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
34b1('bum): pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims/
34b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol
34b3('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
34b4('bum): pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang
34b5('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe//
34b6('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba
34b7('bum): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
35a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/
35a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims de yang mi dmig
35a3('bum): shing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
35a4('bum): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
35a5('bum): pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa'
35a6('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs
35a7('bum): su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
35b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha
35b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su bsrung
35b3('bum): zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
35b4('bum): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
35b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten
35b6('bum): pa'adi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
35b7('bum): chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams
36a1('bum): par mi byed pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/
36a2('bum): dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems rtse
36a3('bum): gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
36a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol
36a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
36a6('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams
36a7('bum): cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
36b1('bum): cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang /
36b2('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
36b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos
36b4('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad
36b5('bum): dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
36b6('bum): ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
36b7('bum): bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
37a1('bum): la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos drang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yang /
37a2('bum): pa bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi
37a3('bum): byed cing brtun mi nges pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
37a4('bum): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse
37a5('bum): gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
37a6('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson
37a7('bum): 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
37b1('bum): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
37b2('bum): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
37b3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
37b4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba
37b5('bum): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
37b6('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul
37b7('bum): khrims bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
38a1('bum): pa spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing //
38a2('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams
38a3('bum): cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
38a4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/
38a5('bum): bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par
38a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
38a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig/
38b1('bum): ba'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
38b2('bum): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
38b3('bum): po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmis
38b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
38b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams
38b6('bum): cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
38b7('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing
39a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
39a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
39a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cang / / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yang la bya bas ma yan gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su
39a4('bum): bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
39a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang
39a6('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems
39a7('bum): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
39b1('bum): / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin/
39b2('bum): gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ blan
39b3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
39b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
39b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba
39b6('bum): 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
39b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
40a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing //
40a2('bum): brabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsgo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam
40a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi
40a4('bum): dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub
40a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
40a6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang /
40a7('bum): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
40b1('bum): kyang mi 'phrogs/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
40b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsan
40b3('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog
40b4('bum): ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni
40b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
40b6('bum): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nga dgu pa// / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti du byang chub
40b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar na ko cha bgos pa la/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched
41a1('bum): du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa/
41a2('bum): 'di lta gu zhig sems can yongs su sbyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/
41a3('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig
41a4('bum): rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
41a5('bum): byed do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
41a6('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang cheng du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
41a7('bum): bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go//
41b1('bum): byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming long su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig
41b2('bum): rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed
41b3('bum): do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes smra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
41b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
41b5('bum): go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes smra brjod pa mdzad cing
41b6('bum): dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod
41b7('bum): cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do//
42a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi
42a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi
42a3('bum): khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//
42a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
42a5('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
42a6('bum): pa 'di lta ga zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// 'o
42a7('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten
42b1('bum): gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/
42b2('bum): do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
42b3('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po 'gro
42b4('bum): pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing song su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyang rjes su sgrog go// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ gang po rje
42b5('bum): tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos
42b6('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge
42b7('bum): ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog
43a1('bum): pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las
43a2('bum): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas
43a3('bum): te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye
43a4('bum): bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yod mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug sngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang
43a5('bum): dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/
43a6('bum): lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shan tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam
43a7('bum): par spyod do/ / de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu
43b1('bum): / sgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i
43b2('bum): sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu sgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi
43b3('bum): dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i
43b4('bum): sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi
43b5('bum): dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang
43b6('bum): dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nyeb
43b7('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
44a1('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar
44a2('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mini skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te
44a3('bum): gnas so/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang
44a4('bum): gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
44a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa
44a6('bum): dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar ni
44a7('bum): nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
44b1('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis
44b2('bum): de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal
44b3('bum): ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
44b4('bum): de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas
44b5('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin
44b6('bum): tuyangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ stong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa
44b7('bum): nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshang
45a1('bum): med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
45a2('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi
45a3('bum): gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
45a4('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes
45a5('bum): rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam
45a6('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchod la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
45a7('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do zhes cung za med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
45b1('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems// /
45b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing
45b3('bum): rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzod pa'i pha rol
45b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang
45b5('bum): po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/
45b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyom
45b7('bum): su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar
46a1('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa
46a2('bum): btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcug sa med pa/
46a3('bum): gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos
46a4('bum): par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ / de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ stong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs
46a5('bum): pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i
46a6('bum): sems rgya chen po shing tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
46a7('bum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gzugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin
46b1('bum): tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ stod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam
46b2('bum): mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs
46b3('bum): pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam
46b4('bum): pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa
46b5('bum): thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i
46b6('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
46b7('bum): bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzug med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan
47a1('bum): mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/
47a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa
47a3('bum): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig
47a4('bum): tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las
47a5('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang
47a6('bum): snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde
47a7('bum): bsnga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po
47b1('bum): shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
47b2('bum): nam mkha'i ma thas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med
47b3('bum): pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
47b4('bum): ba'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/
47b5('bum): gnod pa med pa/ stod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
47b6('bum): ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/
47b7('bum): gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
48a1('bum): bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nung
48a2('bum): par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mthas yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mthas yas skye ma rmed la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam
48a3('bum): mkha' mthas yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
48a4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang
48a5('bum): dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ na
48a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par
48a7('bum): gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bsam gtan
48b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyor cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
48b2('bum): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par
48b3('bum): dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes
48b4('bum): bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan
48b5('bum): gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang
48b6('bum): snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod
48b7('bum): pa med pa/ stod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos
49a1('bum): par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ / de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ stong pa/
49a2('bum): med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu sgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha' mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam
49a3('bum): par spyod do/ / de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ stod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin
49a4('bum): tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
49a5('bum): btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas
49a6('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes
49a7('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la
49b1('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/
49b2('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
49b3('bum): gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
49b4('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na
49b5('bum): yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sem
49b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas
49b7('bum): pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar ni nas nang yongs
50a1('bum): su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis//
50a2('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams
50a3('bum): kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bde ba yang spangs sdug
50a4('bum): bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
50a5('bum): gnas so/ / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ ma gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin
50a6('bum): tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems
50a7('bum): rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ snod pa me pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
50b1('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas ka tu gas pa'i phyogs cu rgyas bkang sde/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa
50b2('bum): tshad med pa gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa lda pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
50b3('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa
50b4('bum): gagazugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
50b5('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs
50b6('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
50b7('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
51a1('bum): 'das te/ cung zad med do zhes cung bar med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes// /
51a2('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
51a3('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang /
51a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
51a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems
51a6('bum): rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ stod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
51a7('bum): nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gtsug
51b1('bum): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
51b2('bum): ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med
51b3('bum): pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do//
51b4('bum): de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas
51b5('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de 'dod pas dben/ sdig po mi dge ba'i chos kyis
51b6('bum): dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod
51b7('bum): pa nye bar zhi nas nang yong su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsas gtan gnyis pa
52a1('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyom su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phag pa rnams kyis de la
52a2('bum): dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang
52a3('bum): spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
52a4('bum): so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas
52a5('bum): so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas
52a6('bum): so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i
52a7('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes meng 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
52b1('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas nyon
52b2('bum): mongs pa rab tu spar ba'i phyir bsam gzhan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed
52b3('bum): dede dag gi ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems
52b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par
52b5('bum): gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul wa
52b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o/ / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
52b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang /
53a1('bum): mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems
53a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/
53a3('bum): sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
53a4('bum): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa
53a5('bum): rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam
53a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum
53a7('bum): pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
53b1('bum): / dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stog/
53b2('bum): pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs
53b3('bum): shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
53b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa
53b5('bum): thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
53b6('bum): du dbang po lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam brgyad pa sgom pa dang /
53b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs
54a1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug/
54a2('bum): pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa
54a3('bum): dang rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang /
54a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
54a5('bum): cad du snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi
54a6('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
54a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad
54b1('bum): yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do/ / snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do// dga' ba'i ting nge
54b2('bum): 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag
54b3('bum): pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed do/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
54b4('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
54b5('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang
54b6('bum): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
54b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
55a1('bum): pa'o/ / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge
55a2('bum): ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
55a3('bum): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med
55a4('bum): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
55a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
55a6('bum): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa
55a7('bum): dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon
55b1('bum): / med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen//
55b2('bum): po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa
55b3('bum): nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid
55b4('bum): shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong
55b5('bum): pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma
55b6('bum): yon/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i
55b7('bum): tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes
56a1('bum): kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
56a2('bum): ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
56a3('bum): po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhog par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
56a4('bum): theg pa chen po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi
56a5('bum): 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ bdag med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa
56a6('bum): dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
56a7('bum): po'i theg pa chen po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang
56b1('bum): gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
56b2('bum): yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
56b3('bum): po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma
56b4('bum): byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa meng pa dang / 'dus byas dang /
56b5('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//
56b6('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu 'di la byang
56b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
57a1('bum): phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems/
57a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
57a3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang nges tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs
57a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
57a5('bum): yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
57a6('bum): par gnas kyang des bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub
57a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
57b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang /
57b2('bum): mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha
57b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha
57b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag
57b5('bum): kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
57b6('bum): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi
57b7('bum): dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing / shes rab
58a1('bum): kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang //
58a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
58a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom
58a4('bum): mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams
58a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
58a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma
58a7('bum): 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa
58b1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
58b2('bum): pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
58b3('bum): du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
58b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
58b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
58b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i
58b7('bum): tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
59a1('bum): cad spong ba nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bam 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang /
59a2('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong
59a3('bum): pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom
59a4('bum): mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa
59a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// tshe dang
59a6('bum): ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs
59a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
59b1('bum): gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgrub pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul/
59b2('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga sgom mo//
59b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
59b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
59b5('bum): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
59b6('bum): bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
59b7('bum): pasabasgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam
