171b4('bum): su spang bar bya ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang lhan cig mi gnas
171b5('bum): shing de'i rgyus yongs su skom pa'i sems mi skyed cing / de'i rgyus gos thob par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar
171b6('bum): bya ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems
171b7('bum): bskyed par bya ste/ gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis ser sna'i
172a1('bum): sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub
172a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dza'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas nyan thos sam/ rang sang
172a3('bum): rgyas yod pa 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste/
172a4('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na
172a5('bum): gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed cing 'thab mo'i sems sam/ rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
172a6('bum): gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/
172a7('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
172b1('bum): phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
172b2('bum): chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod na/ 'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
172b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub lnga la smos kyang mi dgos kyi spang bar bya'o zhes spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//
172b4('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na/ gang gis
172b5('bum): nga rgyal du 'gyur pa'i lhag pa lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang
172b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
172b7('bum): ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams
173a1('bum): yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ dngos por mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o//
173a2('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nges 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti// /
173a3('bum): mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba'o// de la sra drug pa la chos
173a4('bum): drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
173a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di
173a6('bum): dag la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams su shes par bya ba'i gang chen mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// phyin to// phyin par
173a7('bum): 'gyur ro/ / lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / mi brjod pa dang / 'dus ma byas te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
173b1('bum): bos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
173b2('bum): dpa' chen pos 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ / 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o//
173b3('bum): 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas slong mo ba mthong na sems zhum pa mi bskyed do// 'di ltar de
173b4('bum): ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o/ / 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas thog ma sems bskyed nas kha za yog gi sems su
173b5('bum): mi bya'i/ sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
173b6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu med pa'i phyir ro// sems can du 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu med pa'i phyir ro//
173b7('bum): srog tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srog shin tu med pa'i phyir ro// gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de na 'di ltar gang zag shin tu med pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
174a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos tham cad shin tu ma bsdad pa'i phyir chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub/
174a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang la yang skye ba med pa de la rtag pa dang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
174a3('bum): sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur lta bar mi/
174a4('bum): bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na
174a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di lta
174a6('bum): phung po shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar phung po la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/
174a7('bum): de ni 'di ltar khams rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skye mched la mngon par
174b1('bum): chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na skye mched la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen//
174b2('bum): pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par
174b3('bum): chags par mi bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir
174b4('bum): te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos khams gsum la brten par
174b5('bum): mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
174b6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la gnas par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la gnas par mi
174b7('bum): bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la rten pas sangs rgyas
175a1('bum): mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de skar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la rten pa'i rta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang //
175a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la rten pas chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub
175a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la rten pa'i lta ba la
175a4('bum): mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la rten pas dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun
175a5('bum): la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni
175a6('bum): 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la rten pas tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par
175a7('bum): chags par mi bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams spong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi/
175b1('bum): / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid la zhum par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
175b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
175b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
175b4('bum): rdzogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/
175b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa yin zhe na/ de ni khams gsum thams cad du
175b6('bum): sems mi 'jug pa'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o//
175b7('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o// de la
176a1('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/ 'di zheste/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro// des/
176a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bsnan pa dang dbri ba med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
176a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtog pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtog kyang rtogs pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye
176a4('bum): ba la bzod pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
176a5('bum): mi skye ba shes pa gang yin zhe na/ ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
176a6('bum): chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang yin zhe na/ gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan
176a7('bum): pa'o/ / de la byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
176b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par spong ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par/
176b2('bum): bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gang zhe na/ 'di
176b3('bum): g+ha ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang yin zhe na/ khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa med
176b4('bum): pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/ dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thob pa med
176b5('bum): pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug gi btang
176b6('bum): snyoms so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus ston pa'o// de la byang chub sems
176b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na/ sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o//
177a1('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
177a2('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro yang de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
177a3('bum): blta ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa
177a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i
177a5('bum): sa la gnas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing des rlom sems su mi byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen
177a6('bum): bkur ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba
177a7('bum): bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa gang zhe na
177b1('bum): stobs bcu la gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na//
177b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang
177b3('bum): ba gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad byed pa ste/ de'i sems chos gang la yang mi 'jug pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
177b4('bum): yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
177b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
177b6('bum): po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin to/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched du
177b7('bum): bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa
178a1('bum): de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ji lta ji ltar
178a2('bum): smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
178a3('bum): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa'o// de la ji
178a4('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so yang dag par
178a5('bum): rig pas khong du chud pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun gsum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
178a6('bum): tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
178a7('bum): chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen por skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs
178b1('bum): pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs/
178b2('bum): che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phur sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang
178b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi rigs su sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum
178b4('bum): tshogs pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub tu sems can rnams bkod cing
178b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
178b6('bum): tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni
178b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
179a1('bum): dpa' chen po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/
179a2('bum): / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang
179a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba yin/ lhun bai DUR+Yar 'dug pa yin/ yal ga rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin las grub pa yin/ me tog dang lo ma
179a4('bum): rin po che thams cad las gyur pa yin/ shing de'i dri zhim po dang 'od bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang
179a5('bum): chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dag
179a6('bum): chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
179a7('bum): pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol
179b1('bum): tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
179b2('bum): brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su
179b3('bum): rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhini gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba'o// rab 'byor de la byang
179b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul
179b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes
179b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid
179b7('bum): la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog
180a1('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'a spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang/
180a2('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
180a3('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /
180a4('bum): / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam pan lan brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod
180a5('bum): pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
180a6('bum): la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs
180a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang /
180b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ rigs kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'/ brgyad pa'i sa las yang dag par 'bar/
180b2('bum): mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ bsrabs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ rang
180b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'da' ste/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sa dgu las yongs su 'das
180b4('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas te/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po
180b5('bum): la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po re drug pa// / rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang
180b6('bum): 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro//
180b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzu
181a1('bum): med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni 'byung/
181a2('bum): ba'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ byung bar 'gyur ba med de/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
181a3('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnam 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung
181a4('bum): pabar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
181a5('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung ba cha 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad
181a6('bum): do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rab tu byang ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
181a7('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'gog pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang
181b1('bum): / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'drod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar
181b2('bum): 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'du shes stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
181b3('bum): pa de ni 'du byed stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dong du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
181b4('bum): rab 'byor gang gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa
181b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / 'du shes stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'du byed stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
181b6('bum): nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
181b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du shes 'du shes kyis sdong pa'i phyir ro// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
182a1('bum): rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor yang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab
182a2('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna stong pa nyid 'byung
182a3('bum): pabar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de
182a4('bum): ni lus stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig stong
182a5('bum): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rna ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
182a6('bum): pa med do/ / sna stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lce stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad
182a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / lus stong pa nyid mi khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// yid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med/
182b1('bum): ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba rna bas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna sngas stong pa'i phyir/
182b2('bum): ro// lce lces stong pa'i phyir ro// lus lus kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzugs stong pa
182b3('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sgra stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
182b4('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni dri stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ro stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
182b5('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni reg stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
182b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sgra stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas
182b7('bum): 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dri stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// ro stong
183a1('bum): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// reg stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams
183a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / chos stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dri ltar
183a3('bum): gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / sgra sgras stong pa'i phyir ro// dri dris stong pa'i phyir ro// ro ros stong pa'i phyir ro// reg reg gis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// /
183a4('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
183a5('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab
183a6('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lus kyi
183a7('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
183b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni
183b2('bum): khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
183b3('bum): nyid du gnas pa med do/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni
183b4('bum): khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
183b5('bum): nyid du gnas pa med do/ / rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i
183b6('bum): phyir ro/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes
183b7('bum): pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa
184a1('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
184a2('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce'i
184a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
184a4('bum): gang tshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
184a5('bum): nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
184a6('bum): gnas pa med do/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams
184a7('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
184b1('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/
184b2('bum): 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong
184b3('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg
184b4('bum): pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang
184b5('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
184b6('bum): 'dod pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
184b7('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
185a1('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
185a2('bum): 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
185a3('bum): ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
185a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
185a5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni
185a6('bum): khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mag gi 'dus te reg pa'i
185a7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg
185b1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rtse'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus/
185b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnam
185b3('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rmi lam 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sgyu ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
185b4('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni smig rgyu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sgra brnyan 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang
185b5('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig yor 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar
185b6('bum): 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rmi lam ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sgyu ma ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/
185b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sdig rgyu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sgra brnyan ni khams gsum nas 'byung
186a1('bum): ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mig yor ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// de bzhin/
186a2('bum): gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rmi lam ni rmi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
186a3('bum): sgyu ma ni sgyu mas stong pa'i phyir ro// smig rgyu ni smig rgyus stong pa'i phyir ro// sgra brnyan ni sgra brnyan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mig yor ni mig yor gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
186a4('bum): sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
186a5('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bzod pa'i/
186a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang
186a7('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni shes rab kyi
186b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas/
186b2('bum): pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni kham
186b3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad
186b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
186b5('bum): phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni skyon
186b6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
186b7('bum): ngo bo nyid ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam
187a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
187a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
187a3('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang
187a4('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid 'byung bar
187a5('bum): 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod/
187a6('bum): pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan
187a7('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa
187b1('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams// /
187b2('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab
187b3('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mi dmigs
187b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med
187b5('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung
187b6('bum): bar 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// phyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
187b7('bum): nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sto
188a1('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid ni khams gsum ras 'byung ba med do// rnam pa
188a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni khams
188a3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
188a4('bum): med do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas
188a5('bum): 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rang
188a6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams
188a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
188b1('bum): / nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med/
188b2('bum): do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// /
188b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
188b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
188b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis
188b6('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i
188b7('bum): phyir ro/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams
189a1('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
189a2('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
189a3('bum): stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
189a4('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rdzu/
189a5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dbang po rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med
189a6('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni stobs rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'byung bar 'dod/
189a7('bum): du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar
189b1('bum): / gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med
189b2('bum): do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
189b3('bum): dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa
189b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'phags pa'i
189b5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
189b6('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rdzu
189b7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis spong ba'i phyir ro/ / dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stobs rnams kyi
190a1('bum): bo nyid ni stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'phalnga pa'i lam yan lag brgyad/
190a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod/
190a3('bum): du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gtan rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshad
190a4('bum): med pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
190a5('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam par thar pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mthar gyis gnas
190a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
190a7('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtshan ma med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ston pa med pa 'byung bar dong du zad de/
190b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
190b2('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad
190b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rnam
190b4('bum): par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams
190b5('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
190b6('bum): med do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba
190b7('bum): med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi
191a1('bum): stong ba'i phyir ro/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni tshad med pa rnams kyi ngaH/
191a2('bum): nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par thar pa
191a3('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
191a4('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir
191a5('bum): ro/ / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung bar
191a6('bum): 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
191a7('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams
191b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams//
191b2('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni mngon par
191b3('bum): shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa'i phyir ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzungs kyi
191b4('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis slongab pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang
191b5('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
191b6('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
191b7('bum): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams
192a1('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
192a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
192a3('bum): pa med do/ / rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid
192a4('bum): ni mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa'i ngo bo nyid ni
192a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab
192a6('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rang sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
192a7('bum): skye bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
192b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum
192b2('bum): nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// byang chub sems dpa' ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
192b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir
192b4('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems
192b5('bum): dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
192b6('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
192b7('bum): bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
193a1('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rang byang chub 'byung
193a2('bum): bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
193a3('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
193a4('bum): du gnas pa med do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// /
193a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dgra bcom pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rang byang chub ni khams gsum nas 'byung/
193a6('bum): ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rnam pa thams cad
193a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras//
193b1('bum): bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
193b2('bum): bubu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lam gyi
193b3('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang
193b4('bum): batshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ming 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
193b5('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni brda 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tha snyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
193b6('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ming stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
193b7('bum): du gnas pa med do/ / mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// brda stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa
194a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ / tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// gdags pa stong /
194a2('bum): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming stong pa nyid ming stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i

194a4('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni skye ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad

194a6('bum): bar 'dod du zad do/ / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam par byang ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de
194a7('bum): ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
194b1('bum): 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam//

194b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//

194b5('bum): byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs des na 'di ltar theg pa chen po ni kham
194b6('bum): gsum nas byung nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes par bya ste/ gnas de ni bskyod du med pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de
194b7('bum): gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/ theg pa chen po de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor
195a1('bum): de ltar theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab
195a2('bum): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no//

195a4('bum): no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma
195a5('bum): yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo
195a6('bum): bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ / yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do//
195a7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid
195b1('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin//

195b7('bum): 'am mi gnas pa med do/ / 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
196a1('bum): dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ / 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nas/

196a3('bum): ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gog pa'i dbyings 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang
196a4('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po re bdun pa// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas
196a5('bum): ba yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na tshor ba stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang
196a6('bum): ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'du shes stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/
196a7('bum): mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'du byed stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi
196b1('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang /
196b2('bum): ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni
196b3('bum): gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ / tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am
196b4('bum): mi gnas pa med do/ / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyi stong pa'i phyir ro// tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i
196b5('bum): phyir ro/ / 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na mig
196b6('bum): stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rna ba
196b7('bum): stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sna stong pa nyid ni

197a2('bum): pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na lus stong panyid

197a4('bum): pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi ngo btsang la ni gnas pa 'am migs
197a5('bum): pa med do/ / rna ba'i ja ba nyid la nA gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// rtswa'i dzis nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// lce'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// lus kyi ngo ba nyid la ni gnas pa 'am
197a6('bum): mi gnas pa med do/ / yid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni ni se yog mi dgas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna brna bas spong ba'i phyir ro// b+hA rdzas stong pa
197a7('bum): phyir ro/ / lce lces spong pa'i phyir ro// lus lus kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di sa ste/ dper na gzugs song pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang /
197b1('bum): ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgra stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa
197b2('bum): yang ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na dri stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang
197b3('bum): ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na ro stong pa'i nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin
197b4('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na reg stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no//
197b5('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na chos stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin
197b6('bum): dutheg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// sgra'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//
197b7('bum): dri'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// ro'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// reg gi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// chos kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//
198a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sgra smras stong pa'i phyir ro// dri dris stong pa'i phyir ro// ro ros stong pa'i phyir ro// reg reg gis stong //
198a2('bum): pa'i phyir ro// chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen
198a3('bum): po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg
198a4('bum): pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du

198b1('bum): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par/
198b2('bum): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do//
198b3('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mig
198b4('bum): gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir
198b5('bum): ro/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas
198b6('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang

203b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas/
203b2('bum): pa med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid

203b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas
203b5('bum): pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa
203b6('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa
203b7('bum): nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
204a1('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus
