313a5('bum): nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor
313a6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi
313a7('bum): dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
313b1('bum): pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs//
313b2('bum): pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa la yang ci zhig spos/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
313b3('bum): dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
313b4('bum): rus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
313b5('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyis mthar mi dmigs/ yang
313b6('bum): dag par spong ba rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
313b7('bum): rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi
314a1('bum): dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig spros/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig spros/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor//
314a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dus gsum
314a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi
314a4('bum): dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus
314a5('bum): dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dbang po rnam ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni dus
314a6('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus
314a7('bum): kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
314b1('bum): dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni dus/
314b2('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
314b3('bum): dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung
314b4('bum): ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni da ltar
314b5('bum): byung bar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
314b6('bum): pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma
314b7('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam
315a1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam
315a2('bum): pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang
315a3('bum): mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
315a4('bum): dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
315a5('bum): ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma
315a6('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
315a7('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lha yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
315b1('bum): / bsam gtan rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid//
315b2('bum): la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
315b3('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
315b4('bum): dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs
315b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmig pa sna ci ni
315b6('bum): smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmig/ gzug med
315b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnam ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la ming
316a1('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i rus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/
316a2('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig
316a3('bum): smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dus
316a4('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmig/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs// mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam
316a5('bum): pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lha ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lha yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor
316a6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni da ltar
316a7('bum): byung bar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'o/
316b1('bum): pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus// /
316b2('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par
316b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rnam par
316b4('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ong
316b5('bum): pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ra lur byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci nig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigra pa
316b6('bum): lta ci zhig spos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig spos/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams
316b7('bum): ning ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid lam 'ongs pa'i
317a1('bum): dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig spros/
317a2('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
317a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigra/ mnyam pa nyid
317a4('bum): la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
317a5('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzud kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
317a6('bum): dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/
317a7('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig/
317b1('bum): / smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
317b2('bum): ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid
317b3('bum): la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das
317b4('bum): ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi
317b5('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa ba'i ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs//
317b6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma
317b7('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
318a1('bum): dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa
318a2('bum): nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la
318a3('bum): 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor byams pa chen po ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byams pa
318a4('bum): chen po ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byam pa chen po ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ byams pa chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
318a5('bum): mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
318a6('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ snying rje chen po
318a7('bum): ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ snying rje chen po ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ snying rje chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs//
318b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci// /
318b2('bum): zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sangs
318b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la
318b4('bum): mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid
318b5('bum): kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab
318b6('bum): 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/
318b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ nyan
319a1('bum): thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang //
319a2('bum): sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir
319a3('bum): ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dus
319a4('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
319a5('bum): dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
319a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
319a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
319b1('bum): / mnan te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis//
319b2('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la
319b3('bum): bslabs shing / 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
319b4('bum): po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ dpag tu ma ma
319b5('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi
319b6('bum): pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin
319b7('bum): no/ / de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
320a1('bum): pa nyid brnyes par gyur to/ / brnyes so// brnyes par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu gnyis so// shes rab kyi sa/
320a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po don bzhi pa// // de nas byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ri de bzhin gshegs pa
320a3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsgo ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom
320a4('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gam gcig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
320a5('bum): rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa yang med de/ rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/ nyan
320a6('bum): thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do// rab 'byor
320a7('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub
320b1('bum): sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
320b2('bum): pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
320b3('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
320b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
320b5('bum): dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
320b6('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
320b7('bum): dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
321a1('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
321a2('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing
321a3('bum): khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so// rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi
321a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
321a5('bum): byin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa
321a6('bum): dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang
321a7('bum): yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang
321b1('bum): yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes// /
321b2('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa
321b3('bum): dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi
321b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs
321b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang /
321b6('bum): rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
321b7('bum): yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa
322a1('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas spong ba
322a2('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos
322a3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa
322a4('bum): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin
322a5('bum): pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams
322a6('bum): gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang yin pa
322a7('bum): dang / rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang /

322b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin

328a7('bum): ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig mngon par grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'am zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las
328b1('bum): / gud na yang / byang chub sems dpa'asem dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
328b2('bum): sems mi 'dzum/ yongs su mi 'jum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces
328b3('bum): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ng+ga ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
328b4('bum): dmigs so/ / sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir byang
328b5('bum): / chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sems can sdod pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra d+hA ti'i swA/
328b6('bum): sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
328b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa dang / sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi ma'i mthar mi dmim
329a1('bum): so/ / dbus su mi dmigs so// sems can med pa yang gzhan/ sems can stong pa yang gzhan/ sems can dben pa yang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin med pa yang gzhan zhigs/
329a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan/ dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sems can med pa gang yin pa
329a3('bum): dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
329a4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmi gso// /
329a5('bum): gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
329a6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
329a7('bum): gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
329b1('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// gzugs ngo bo nyid
329b2('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs med pa dag gzugs stong pa nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med
329b3('bum): pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ gzugs med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin
329b4('bum): gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
329b5('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na gzugs med pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
329b6('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/

330a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs//

330a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba med

331a1('bum): gzhanam yin/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes dben pa yang gzhan ma lon/ 'du shes ram tshad med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gnan ma man/

331b1('bum): / stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

332a7('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzham ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin

341a1('bum): par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi//
341a2('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
341a3('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /
341a4('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
341a5('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
341a6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
341a7('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid meng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
341b1('bum): / mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
341b2('bum): so/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba'i
341b3('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo/
341b4('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rna
341b5('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan
341b6('bum): ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
341b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /
342a1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
342a2('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i
342a3('bum): rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa
342a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i
342a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
342a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
342a7('bum): dmigs so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sna'i
342b1('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa
342b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sna'i rnam par
342b3('bum): shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin//
342b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sna'i rnam par
342b5('bum): shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
342b6('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
342b7('bum): zur lha'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sku
343a1('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
343a2('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa
343a3('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir bya/
343a4('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
343a5('bum): mi dmigs so/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
343a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa med
343a7('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems

343b2('bum): dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
343b3('bum): dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi rnam par
343b4('bum): shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par
343b5('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa
343b6('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i
343b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir
344a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / lus gyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben/
344a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti
344a3('bum): bulus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi
344a4('bum): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes
344a5('bum): pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
344a6('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam
344a7('bum): par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
344b1('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs//
344b2('bum): so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid
344b3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par
344b4('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par she pa ngo bo nyid
344b5('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
344b6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
344b7('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa
345a1('bum): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin//
345a2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
345a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang /
345a4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
345a5('bum): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i
345a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
345a7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
345b1('bum): / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo
345b2('bum): tid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
345b3('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
345b4('bum): so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/
345b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben
345b6('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
345b7('bum): yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus
346a1('bum): te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad//
346a2('bum): kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi
346a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
346a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa spyong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
346a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
346a6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba'i
346a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
346b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
346b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin//
346b3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no//
346b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
346b5('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
346b6('bum): do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
346b7('bum): dmigs so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
347a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i
347a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa
347a3('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
347a4('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / sna'i
347a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa
347a6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
347a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
347b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dag sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
347b2('bum): na pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus
347b3('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
347b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
347b5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig
347b6('bum): so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben
347b7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i
348a1('bum): 'dus te rig pa med pa dang / sku'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ba nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' gyi/
348a2('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo
348a3('bum): nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lce'i
348a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
348a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med
348a6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
348a7('bum): dba' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyir
348b1('bum): / mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
348b2('bum): so ra lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i sar mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
348b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
348b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
348b5('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus
348b6('bum): te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
348b7('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin/
349a1('bum): pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
349a2('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong
349a3('bum): ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
349a4('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
349a5('bum): mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid
349a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang
349a7('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te
349b1('bum): reg pa med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi/
349b2('bum): dmigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/
349b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa
349b4('bum): dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
349b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang
349b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben
349b7('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
350a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
350a2('bum): dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
350a3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir
350a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med
350a5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong
350a6('bum): pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
350a7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
350b1('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan// /
350b2('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg
350b3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
350b4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub
350b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
350b6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus
350b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
351a1('bum): sor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i/
351a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
351a3('bum): ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus
351a4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa
351a5('bum): dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyis mtha'
351a6('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
351a7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
351b1('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang //
351b2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
351b3('bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
351b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
351b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med
351b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
351b7('bum): bstong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
352a1('bum): gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su 'i dmigs so//
352a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so//
352a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /
352a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
352a5('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
352a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
352a7('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
352b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin/
352b2('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
352b3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i
352b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
352b5('bum): dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
352b6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i
352b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
353a1('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// na
353a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / lce'i
353a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs
353a4('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa yang
353a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
353a6('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i
353a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
353b1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang /
353b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
353b3('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi
353b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
353b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
353b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
353b7('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
354a1('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba med pa dang / lus kyi//
354a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
354a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi
354a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
354a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus
354a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
354a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang
354b1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi
354b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
354b3('bum): gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid
354b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
354b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir
354b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
354b7('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir
355a1('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba spong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus
355a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
355a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben
355a4('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
355a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba med pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stod
355a6('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
